title: Across the Miles: Tales of Correspondence
description: Love notes, marriage proposals, heartfelt promises, honest confessions, cruel deceptions: These are the many variations on the theme of this collection, in which each story hinges on the writing or receiving of a letter. These nostalgic stories, filled with all the wit and wisdom of L.M. Montgomery, take us back to a time when letters held not only news of friends and family, but the power to change lives.
author: L.M. Montgomery
